trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Westcliffe
There were no other sightings in Westcliffe on or around January 21st 2013
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsi woke at 2:10 am and decided to smoke a cigarette. i opened my bedroom window (sw) and noticed a strange flashing light at the base of the sangre de cristo mtn range. as i sat and watched i saw two other craft ( v ) shaped join the other. granted this event is approx 12 miles away, but the shapes from my vantage point combined with lights made it very easy to discern. i was extremely excited and watched til dawn. that date was 1\21\12. others including my neighbor have been watching it also. nobody i've talked to has ever seen anything like it. i have had, as have many here, numerous sightings. we are just, as the eagle fly's, not more than a stone throw over the mountains from crestone and the san luis valley. this is an exxtremely active area, and would behoove mufon to have someone as either a trained observer, or a field agent be here permanently, or on a regular basis'
Summary: Event still in progress, and observing as I write
